name: Save new signed waivers to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time new waiver is signed in via WaiverFile, Make will automatically add a row to a Google Sheets spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pcEhNGiITZGBZe9gylRvMgZDvhFByrICCXPoURJu4hA/edit?usp=sharing).
